articles.title: Virginia man brings history to life with restored caboose
articles.description: PINEY RIVER, Va. (AP) — For Ted Hughes, restoration ensures history isn’t lost.
articles.content:
PINEY RIVER, Va. (AP) For Ted Hughes, restoration ensures history isnt lost.
Hughes, 86, born and raised in Nelson County, walked through a red caboose in Piney River earlier this month, pointing out all the period features including an iron potbelly stove t… [+3789 chars]

articles.title: Educator leads the way in bringing technology to classrooms
articles.description: NORFOLK, Va. (AP) — Teachers were some of the loudest cynics when Berkley-Campostella Early Childhood Center won a grant that gave an iPad to every student.
articles.content:
NORFOLK, Va. (AP) Teachers were some of the loudest cynics when Berkley-Campostella Early Childhood Center won a grant that gave an iPad to every student.

articles.title: Pompeo: US military would only hit lawful targets in Iran

articles.content:

articles.title: Women's rally to address climate, elections, health
articles.description: CONCORD, N.H. (AP) — This year's New Hampshire Women's Rally will feature speakers on reproductive health, climate, immigration, and electing women to office from the bottom to the top of the ticket.
articles.content:
CONCORD, N.H. (AP) This year's New Hampshire Women's Rally will feature speakers on reproductive health, climate, immigration, and electing women to office from the bottom to the top of the ticket.

articles.description: AUGUSTA, Maine (AP) — Maine Department of Inland Fisheries and Wildlife biologists are getting ready to round up some moose.
articles.content:
AUGUSTA, Maine (AP) Maine Department of Inland Fisheries and Wildlife biologists are getting ready to round up some moose.

articles.description: A veteran fighter pilot is set to take command of the Vermont Air National Guard's 158th Fighter Wing.
articles.content:

articles.description: GREENSBURG, Pa. (AP) — Highway official says at least 5 dead, 60 injured in massive crash on Pennsylvania Turnpike outside of Pittsburgh.

articles.title: Statue of Zlatan Ibrahimovic overturned in Malmo
articles.description: MALMO (AP) — After weeks of vandalism, the statue of Zlatan Ibrahimovic has finally been overturned.
articles.content:
MALMO (AP) After weeks of vandalism, the statue of Zlatan Ibrahimovic has finally been overturned.
The 500-kilogram monument, which is located outside Malmos soccer stadium, was cut off at the feet, causing it to topple over onto a wire fence overnight Sunda… [+1308 chars]
